Weapons.Description: Standard issue fighting/work knife used by USMC infantry during WWII.
Austrian knife designed and manufactured by Glock. Developed in close coordination with Austrian special forces.
A prominent WWI and WWII German manufactured grenade that is a great piece for any collector. Fully functional.
An extremely rare piece of German WWI equipment that was used in tandem with the Granatenwerfer 16 infantry mortar. Not functional.

Vehicles.Description: The infamous tank that was most recognizably used during the Gulf war by U.S. forces. Though the first generation of these tanks have been out of serive for more than 20 years, we are proud to be able to sell our customers fully functioning units.

Most notably used during the Vietnam war to help U.S. Army units break through fortified positions and overrun the enemy. These tried and true armored troop carriers come in great condition and still function up to manufactuer standards.

Miscellaneous.Description: Kuhl sleek warm jacket boasts a baffled water-repellent nylon/spandex shell with 800-fill-power goose down. Reinforced shoulders zipper closures. Machine wash

Miscellaneous.Description: Yarn-dyed indigenous-inspired pattern will catch your attention in this chambray-lined button front shirt with two pockets corduroy-lined neckline and side gussets. Cotton. Machine wash.
